name: Chemenigma
description: A competition that tests your calibre in Chemistry through thought-provoking questions that demand knowledge coupled with creativity. Enjoy yourselves and compete with students across the country while displaying your skills and ingenuity in solving problems.
Prove that you are among the best in the Prelims to qualify for the Finals!

The Final event will truly bring out the Enigma of Chemenigma. The finalists would have to work their way through challenging problems that may or may not have known solutions with the exciting opportunity to present and defend their work in front of leading Chemists in the panel of judges!

modules.heading: Eligibility
modules.content: Students in class 11 or above (till 2<sup>nd</sup> year UG) and have not started their 3<sup>rd</sup> year of UG are eligible. Teams may have at most two participants. Individual participation is allowed.

modules.heading: Prizes
modules.content: Cash Prizes over 30K for winners and certificates for all finalists.

points: No late submission will be entertained
6 best teams will be selected for the Finals.
